nodes.text: A radar detector was a piece of technology. Wearers of the ceremonial Helmet of Fourteen Confusions would break into impromptu speeches written in the 41st eon as they passed through radar detectors.

Radar detector was mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
